codeanticode.glgraphics
Class GLTextureFilterParameter

java.lang.Object
  codeanticode.glgraphics.GLTextureFilterParameter
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLConstants
public class GLTextureFilterParameter
extends java.lang.Object
implements GLConstants

This class stores the parameter for a filter. It can be of type int, float, vec2, vec3, vec4, mat2, mat3 or mat4.

Field Summary
